choiceresponse.label: Which of the following will ensure that audit learners can see a problem in your course?

checkboxgroup.choice: Setting the problem's weight to 0 points.
Adjusting the Settings tab for the problem.
Placing the problem in an ungraded subsection.
Placing the problem in a subsection with a grading type that is worth 0%.
Placing the problem in a subsection with a grading type that is worth 0% AND setting the problem's weight to 0 points.

div.p: Audit learners can see any problems that do not contribute to their grade, with the exception of problems in a grading type worth 0%. When criteria overlap, the problem's own settings take precedence.
